Package cz.cuni.mff.desitka.logic.game

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.desitka.logic.game.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStates
public class GameController extends Object implements GameStates
Controller for game logic. This class manages the game functionality of the application.
